name: ICY: Frostbite Edition
description: ICY: Frostbite Edition is a narrative-driven post-apocalyptic survival RPG set in a new Ice Age. Create your character, lead your family, make difficult choices, and try to survive in a frozen world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 1000 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1500 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
